about_the_game:
Take the roll of Chucky, and help him find his way to heaven all the way from hell.

Chucky is a happy demon, who don't feel like he fit in. Chucky gets the opportunity to flee from hell and try to reach heaven. This is however not an easy journey. The ruler of hell sends out other demons to try and stop you, and even without those, the journey is filled with dangerous jumping places, where you will fall down and die if you are not careful. Avoid traps, fight off monsters, solve puzzles, discover hidden areas, but make sure to enjoy every step you take in this beautiful world filled with different areas.

Fight and defeat Monsters and Bosses.

Fight your way through dangerous areas, where monsters and demons will try and stop you. Encounter bosses and defeat them, if you fail to do this, you will be send back yo hell for eternity.

Jump Through Different Jumping Puzzles.

To be able to jump is essentiel to reach your goal. The world will have different level of jumping puzzles, that you will need to complete. Fear not! Chucky is an excellent jumper.

Solve Puzzles and Riddles.

On your travel you will counter different puzzles and riddles, that will let you continue your journy, or even open secret areas.

Find and Collect Good and Evil Essence.

Your journey will take you through many places, but you need essence to travel from place to place. You must collect good and evil essence from the world. This will let you unluck the demongates.

Your journey

Travel Through Many Different Areas on your journey. In each zone you are passing through, you will be able to explore the map just the way you feel like. Search for hidden areas, walk around enjoying the view, take a swim in a lake. Be careful of deadly traps though, besides monsters the world will have traps placed so watch where you are going.

content_descriptors.notes: Mild violence, blood splatter when killing enemies or getting hit, and a rude troll with a green "finger" between legs.

name: Chucky: The Road To Heaven

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4000 series or equivalent
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750 or equivalent, integrated graphics not supported
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are not final

short_description: Chucky:TRTH is a 3D, action-adventure, jumping puzzle game. You a cute demon trying to reach heaven all the way from hell. Travel through many different locations, filled with monsters, puzzles, traps, hidden objects etc. Will you reach your goal or fail? That is for you to find out.
